caption.center: JAMES HERMAN FOSTER v. GEORGE SOULE.

opinion.posture: IN RE: GEORGE SOULE, APPLYING FOR CERTIORARI, OR WRIT OF REVIEW, TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FOURTH CIRCUIT, PARISH OF ORLEANS.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ denied. The judgment of the Court of Appeal is correct, for the reason, among others, that the facts found support it.West Page 828
